note:
Living on the Isle of Islay for a fair few years now - work with plants at a distillery here. Interests are broad and varied but botany, foraging, sewing, pattern cutting, open source software, history, mythology, linux, gardening, cycling, tinkering and generally pottering about tend to rank fairly highly.
I tend to lurk about here more than post, but I'll have the odd flurry.
Limited tolerance for eejits.
